name: @rangle/radius-foundations
description: Foundation scripts and variables for Design Systems

scripts.tokens:update: export RADIUS_LAYERS_SUFFIX=-${npm_package_version} && yarn tokens:validate && yarn tokens:parse && yarn tokens:generate && yarn tokens:docs && yarn tokens:default-theme-settings && yarn tokens:constants && yarn tokens:types
scripts.tokens:parse: mkdir -p src/generated && cat ./tokens.json | ts-node --project tsconfig.generate.json scripts/to-layers.ts > src/generated/token-layers${RADIUS_LAYERS_SUFFIX}.json
scripts.tokens:generate: cat src/generated/token-layers${RADIUS_LAYERS_SUFFIX}.json | ts-node --project tsconfig.generate.json scripts/generate-theme.ts css > src/generated/theme.css
scripts.tokens:types: cat src/generated/token-layers${RADIUS_LAYERS_SUFFIX}.json | ts-node --project tsconfig.generate.json scripts/generate-theme.ts types > src/generated/design-tokens.types.ts && prettier --config ../../.prettierrc --write src/generated/design-tokens.types.ts
scripts.tokens:constants: cat src/generated/token-layers${RADIUS_LAYERS_SUFFIX}.json | ts-node --project tsconfig.generate.json scripts/generate-theme.ts constants > src/generated/design-tokens.constants.ts && prettier --config ../../.prettierrc --write src/generated/design-tokens.constants.ts
scripts.tokens:default-theme-settings: cat src/generated/token-layers${RADIUS_LAYERS_SUFFIX}.json | ts-node --project tsconfig.generate.json scripts/generate-theme.ts defaultThemeSettings > src/generated/default-theme-settings.constants.ts && prettier --config ../../.prettierrc --write src/generated/default-theme-settings.constants.ts
scripts.build-icons: rm -rf src/generated/icons && svgr --icon --typescript --filename-case kebab --out-dir src/generated/icons --svgo-config ./svgo.config.js src/assets/icons/svg
scripts.build-brands: rm -rf src/generated/brand && mkdir -p src/generated/brand && cp -Rf ../../radius/brands/* src/generated/brand
scripts.build-generated: yarn build-brands  && yarn tokens:update && yarn build-icons && yarn tokens:assets

author: jason.santos@rangle.io
